website_summaries.verdict: Longtime Fader and Metal Mulisha fans rejoice as the collaboration between the two brands continues to flourish. The Etnies Fader is one of the brand's longest running and time-tested models that's known for its durability, superb comfort, and old-school skate style.Metal Mulisha chose the reputable Fader as its canvas for this partnership and built on the Fader's good attributes by enhancing its aesthetic. If you're a fan of both brands or if you're just looking to amp up your skate shoe collection, this product might fit the bill.
pros: The Etnies Metal Mulisha Fader is available in several neutral colorways that make it easy to pair with a wide selection of casual outfits
Majority of the reviewers were delighted with how comfortable this shoe is
Some wearers shared that their pair lasted 2 to 4 years before wearing out
The sneaker offers excellent grip, based on a number of comments from several buyers
A lot of consumers adored the kick's classic skate look and stylish graphics
Most purchasers said that it fits true to size
Its materials and construction were deemed to be of excellent quality by several customers
Some longtime fans appreciate that this model is still being offered
With the kick's durability and comfort, a lot of wearers use this sneaker for biking and skateboarding
cons: A few didn't particularly like a symbol used by Metal Mulisha that pertains to harmful ideologies from the past

customer_reviews.title: Well-built smart sport shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Advertised as polished/shining leather but it is not. Its suede I assume. Looks smart besides its ugly ‘fat’ tongue! Very comfortable.Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nicholas  K

customer_reviews.title: trainers
customer_reviews.text: trainers arrived in good time . delivered by royal mail , which is excellent as more predictable time for delivery. Trainers are a good fit , happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Great hard wearing trainer shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a gift to our daughters partner but reports are they fit very well and are very comfortable. They replaced a similar pair that gave several years of daily use. Highly recommended by the owner.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful trainers well made great fit comfortable, and look so good
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're so comfortable, no rubbing at all. My last pair took a few weeks to wear in and rubbed the back of my heels but these are perfect. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: H Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 10/10
customer_reviews.text: I have no dislikes. I like the fit of the shoes. The materials are nice and the comfort is good With nice padding. The look is amazing and fresh and came brand new and all what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy123123

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, a bit stiff to start as always but broke in quickly. Look lovely, I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Buffett

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 36hrs. Impressed as always with speed of delivery and quality of item. Would recommend as these shoes last for at least 2 yrs even with constant wear.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who loves them. No problems and am happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Beesley

customer_reviews.title: My son just loved them
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment, just as expected, always the same high standered products from etnies. My son just loved them
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J.

customer_reviews.title: Great just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Had Etnies before and these are just as good, may only gripe is personally I would like a little more cushion on the sole!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Etnies Men's Metal Mulisha Fader Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: The long running and best selling etnies shoe, the Fader, teams up with Metal Mulisha.
